abstract: The approval of a Vertex Pharmaceuticals drug sets off a marketing battle with Merck.
snippet: The approval of a Vertex Pharmaceuticals drug sets off a marketing battle with Merck.
lead_paragraph: Vertex Pharmaceuticals won regulatory approval on Monday for a new hepatitis C drug, setting off a marketing battle with Merck over new drugs that are expected to improve the cure rate of the disease and shorten the duration of treatment.

headline.main: Second Drug Wins Approval For Treatment of Hepatitis C
headline.print_headline: Second Drug Wins Approval For Treatment of Hepatitis C
